abstract: Warren E. Buffett’s investment company, Berkshire Hathaway, on Monday disclosed its stakes in Exxon Mobil and Nestlé, as well as in the waste disposal company Republic Services and the Travelers Companies.
snippet: Warren E. Buffett’s investment company, Berkshire Hathaway, on Monday disclosed its stakes in Exxon Mobil and Nestlé, as well as in the waste disposal company Republic Services and the Travelers Companies.
lead_paragraph: Warren E. Buffett‘s investment company, Berkshire Hathaway, on Monday disclosed its stakes in Exxon Mobil and Nestlé, as well as in the waste disposal company Republic Services and the Travelers Companies.

headline.main: Buffett Discloses Stakes in Exxon and Nestlé
